title: Bonus: Future of Wages for Disabled Workers
description: On this special weekend episode of the podcast, Bloomberg Law’s Paige Smith reads her recent story on how laws that allow companies to pay disabled workers below minimum wage may be changing soon.
itunes:title: Bonus Weekend Episode: Future of Wages for Disabled Workers
itunes:author: Bloomberg Law
itunes:summary: On this special weekend episode of the podcast, Bloomberg Law’s Paige Smith reads her recent story on how laws that allow companies to pay disabled workers below minimum wage may be changing soon.
